original_title: Viva La Diva: The Queens of Pop
overview: The word 'diva' is used to describe otherworldly talent - a term bestowed upon the best of the best in the world of opera. But somewhere along the line, the meaning got polluted by the male-dominated world of showbiz. In this programme, Ana Matronic reclaims the word by presenting five legendary artists.
title: Viva La Diva: The Queens of Pop
